title: sadguru dakSiNAmUrtim
sahitya:
sadguru dakSiNAmUrtim nuhirE citta


anupallavi

  madguru pAda rAmakrSNAdi vara vidvad-gAyaka chatratati hrd-kairavAbjam


caraNam    varISTham guNiSu baliSTham vidvatsu anavaratam mrdutaramita bhASiNam 
parama sushIlam vibhUti vilasita phAlam muraLI gAnAmrtam pibantam shrI
